mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject SET class_id = #{classId}, subject_name = #{subjectName}, score_type = #{scoreType}
mapper.select: SELECT A.subject_name, B.exam_date, CASE WHEN A.SCORE_TYPE = 0 THEN B.score ELSE CASE WHEN COALESCE(B.PASS, 0) = 0 THEN '불합격' ELSE '합격' END END score FROM subject A INNER JOIN grade B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN joinclass C ON B.join_class_id = C.join_class_id WHERE C.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
